name: Maze Trials
description: Maze Trials is a maze running game, find your way out of the mazes, don't forget to collect the key to unlock the exit.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2GHz Intel i3, 2GHz AMD Athlon x2 Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000, Nvidia GTX 560, ATI Radeon HD 3200 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
